question_text: Select two correct steps for installing a new SODIMM module in a laptop.
answer_options: Apply thermal paste to the module
Insert the module at a 30-degree angle
Push down until the module locks into clips
Secure the module with a small screw
correct_answer: Insert the module at a 30-degree angle
Push down until the module locks into clips
explanation: SODIMMs slide in at an angle and are pressed down to click into retention clips â€” no paste or screws needed.
